summary: A minimal ENB preset focusing on aesthetic contrast, atmospheric mists, subtle colours and soft skies.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u]
[/u][/size][center][size=4][u]Celerity ENB[/u][/size]
By Billyro[/center]


[u]Description[/u]

Celerity ENB is a minimal preset focusing on aesthetic contrast, atmospheric mists, subtle colours and soft skies.

There is [u]no[/u] bloom, lens effects, depth of field, sky lighting, or reflection in this preset. The performance hit is as minimal as possible, without sacrificing the essentials.



[u]Requirements and Recommended Mods[/u]

Required:
- [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm]ENBSeries v0.308[/url] (or later)

Recommended:
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates of Tamriel[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]Enhanced Lighting for ENB[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url] (install the ENB textures as well for parallax)
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?]Watercolour for ENB[/url] (requires Realistic Water Two)
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures
[/url]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32246/?]Ultimate Lush Overhaul[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17168/?]Skyrim Bigger Trees[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60150/?]
[/url]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant Grass[/url]



[u]Compatibility[/u]

This preset was designed for Climates of Tamriel - using another weather mod may produce undesired results. 

Not compatible with early versions of ENB, nor other ENB presets. 



[u]Installation[/u]

NOTE: If you are new to ENB, I highly recommend checking out the [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENB]STEP Guide to ENB[/url] before proceeding.

1. Delete any ENB files you currently have (or back them up somewhere)
2. Copy [i]ONLY[/i] the d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe from the ENB Wrapper folder to your Skyrim folder
3. Copy the contents of this preset archive to your Skyrim folder
4. Done



[u]Known Issues[/u]

The blue sky sometimes shines through overcast weather.



[u]Permissions[/u]

Don't redistribute elsewhere. Please ask me for permission if you wish to make alterations to this preset. 



[u]Changelog[/u]

v1: Initial release



[u]Credits[/u]

Boris Vorontsov: Creator of ENB
author: Billyro
